description: A comprehensive telecommuting solution for managing remote, hybrid, and onsite meetings, team availability, and office space visibility, all tailored to user roles.
details: wrkPass is designed to streamline telecommuting by enabling users to schedule meetings, declare work statuses, view team availability, and explore company premisesâ€”all based on their specific role. The app ensures that teams can collaborate efficiently, no matter where they are working from.
note: NB: In order to use the meeting creation feature, ensure your app has integrated calendar services, and store necessary credentials in the env.json file located in the Shared folder.
